unalcol.io

Class Write<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.io.Write<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WriteDescriptors, WriteWrapper

    public abstract class Write<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Write

    Writing service. Writes objects to a Writer

    Source code is available.

      • write

        public abstract void write(T obj,
                           java.io.Writer writer)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Writes an object to the given writer
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to write
        writer - The writer object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • get

        public static Write<?> get(java.lang.Object owner)
        Gets the writing service used by the object owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Object owning the writing service.
        Returns:
        The writing service used by the object.

      • set

        public static boolean set(java.lang.Object owner,
                          Write<?> service)
        Sets the writing service used by object owner to service service.
        Parameters:
        owner - Object owning the writing service.
        service - Writing service that will be used by object owner.
        Returns:
        true if the service can be used by object owner, false otherwise.

      • apply

        public static void apply(java.lang.Object obj,
                         java.io.Writer writer)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Writes an object to the given writer (The object should has a write method)
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to write
        writer - The writer object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object obj)
        Gets the persistent version of an object in String version. The Class which the object belongs to should have associated a ClassPersistence object in the Persistence class
        Parameters:
        obj - Object that will be stored in an string
        Returns:
        String containing the persistent version of the object
